languages.text: "Во славу {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}, да уснет дух сей машины, чтобы пробудиться вновь и служить". {n}Паскаль осторожно касается короны сервитора, деактивируя один из ее сегментов.{/n} "Да будет погружен во тьму внешний контур невральной связи". {n}Еще одно касание, несколько огоньков на короне гаснет.{/n} "Да умолкнет узел командного отклика".

traits.locale_text: "Во славу {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}, да уснет дух сей машины, чтобы пробудиться вновь и служить". {n}Паскаль осторожно касается короны сервитора, деактивируя один из ее сегментов.{/n} "Да будет погружен во тьму внешний контур невральной связи". {n}Еще одно касание, несколько огоньков на короне гаснет.{/n} "Да умолкнет узел командного отклика".

languages.text: "For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."
languages.original_text: "Во славу {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}, да уснет дух сей машины, чтобы пробудиться вновь и служить". {n}Паскаль осторожно касается короны сервитора, деактивируя один из ее сегментов.{/n} "Да будет погружен во тьму внешний контур невральной связи". {n}Еще одно касание, несколько огоньков на короне гаснет.{/n} "Да умолкнет узел командного отклика".

traits.locale_text: "For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal touches the servitor's crown carefully, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}His next touch makes several of the lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

"For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal touches the servitor's crown carefully, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}His next touch makes several of the lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

"For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

"For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

"For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

"For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

languages.text: "Zum Ruhme des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, lasset diesen Maschinengeist schlafen, auf dass er wieder erwachen und dienen kann." {n}Pasqal berührt sanft die Krone des Servitors und deaktiviert eines ihrer Segmente.{/n} "Lasset den externen neuralen Verbindungskreis in Dunkelheit getaucht werden." {n}Eine weitere Berührung, und mehrere Lichter in der Krone erlöschen.{/n} "Lasset das Befehlsreaktionszentrum verstummen."
languages.original_text: "For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

traits.locale_text: "Zum Ruhme des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, lasset diesen Maschinengeist schlafen, auf dass er wieder erwachen und dienen kann." {n}Pasqal berührt sanft die Krone des Servitors und deaktiviert eines ihrer Segmente.{/n} "Lasset den externen neuralen Verbindungskreis in Dunkelheit getaucht werden." {n}Eine weitere Berührung, und mehrere Lichter in der Krone erlischen.{/n} "Lasset das Befehlsreaktionszentrum verstummen."

languages.text: « Pour la gloire de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} ! Laissons l'esprit de cette machine dormir, qu'il se réveille et puisse à nouveau servir. »{n}Pasqal effleure doucement la couronne du servitor, désactivant l'un de ses composants.{/n} « Que le circuit de connexion neurale externe soit plongé dans les ténèbres. » {n}Il recommence et plusieurs voyants de la couronne s'éteignent.{/n} « Que se taise le relais de réponse aux commandes. »
languages.original_text: "For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

traits.locale_text: « Pour la gloire de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} ! Laissons l'esprit de cette machine dormir, qu'il se réveille et puisse à nouveau servir. »{n}Pasqal effleure doucement la couronne du servitor, désactivant l'un de ses composants.{/n} « Que le circuit de connexion neurale externe soit plongé dans les ténèbres. » {n}Il recommence et plusieurs voyants de la couronne s'éteignent.{/n} « Que se taise le relais de réponse aux commandes. »

languages.text: “为了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的荣耀，让机魂休息吧。以便它日后苏醒，再次投身服务。”{n}帕斯卡轻轻触摸着机仆的冠冕，关闭了它的一部分功能。{/n}“让外部神经连接回路沉入黑暗之中吧。”{n}他又碰了一下，冠冕上的几盏灯也熄灭了。{/n}“让命令响应中心陷入静默吧。”
languages.original_text: "For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

traits.locale_text: “为了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的荣耀，让机魂休息吧。以便它日后苏醒，再次投身服务。”{n}帕斯卡轻轻触摸着奴工的冠冕，关闭了它的一部分功能。{/n}“让外部神经连接回路沉入黑暗之中吧。”{n}他又碰了一下，冠冕上的几盏灯也熄灭了。{/n}“让命令响应中心陷入静默吧。”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}を讃え、この機械精霊を眠らせ、再び呼び起こして仕えさせましょう」{n}パスカルはサーヴィターの王冠にそっと触れると、セグメントのひとつを無効化した。{/n}「外側の神経接続回路を暗闇にする」{n}もう一度触れると、王冠のライトがいくつか消える。{/n}「コマンドレスポンスハブを沈黙状態に」
languages.original_text: "For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}を讃えて、この機械精霊を眠らせ、再び呼び起こして仕えさせよう」{n}パスカルはサーヴィターの王冠にそっと触れると、セグメントのひとつを無効化した。{/n}「外側の神経接続回路を暗闇にする」{n}また触れると、王冠のライトがいくつか消える。{/n}「コマンドレスポンスハブを沈黙状態に」

languages.text: «Por la gloria del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, que duerma este espíritu máquina, para que despierte y vuelva a servir». {n}Pasqal toca suavemente la corona del servidor, desactivando uno de sus segmentos.{/n} «Que el circuito externo de conexión neuronal se sumerja en la oscuridad». {n}Otro toque, y varias luces de la corona se apagan.{/n} «Que se calle el concentrador de respuesta de comandos».
languages.original_text: "For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

traits.locale_text: «Por la gloria del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, que duerma este espíritu máquina, para que despierte y vuelva a servir». {n}Pasqal toca suavemente la corona del servidor, desactivando uno de sus segmentos.{/n} «Que el circuito externo de conexión neuronal se sumerja en la oscuridad». {n}Otro toque, y varias luces de la corona se apagan.{/n} «Que se calle el concentrador de respuesta de comandos».

languages.text: "Ey Yüce {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}, makine ruhunu uyur eyle. Eyle ki uyanıp yeniden hizmet edebilsin." {n}Pasqal, nazikçe hizmetörün tacına dokunuyor ve tacın bir parçası kapanıveriyor.{/n} "Dış sinirsel bağlantı devreleri karanlığa gömülsün." {n}Bir defa daha dokunuyor. Bu sefer tacın üstündeki birden fazla ışık sönüyor.{/n} "Komut yanıt merkezi, sessizliğe teslim olsun."
languages.original_text: "For the glory of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}, let this machine spirit sleep, that it may awaken and serve again." {n}Pasqal gently touches the servitor's crown, deactivating one of its segments.{/n} "Let the outer neural connection circuit be plunged in darkness." {n}Another touch, and several lights on the crown go out.{/n} "Let the command response hub fall silent."

traits.locale_text: "Ey Yüce {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}, makine ruhunu uyur eyle. Eyle ki uyanıp yeniden huzurunda diz çökebilsin." {n}Pasqal, son derece dikkatli hareketlerle servitörün tacına dokunuyor ve tacın bir parçası sönüveriyor.{/n} "Dış sinirsel devreleri karanlığa gömülsün." {n}Bir defa daha dokunuyor. Bu sefer birden fazla ışık sönüyor.{/n} "Komuta merkezi, sessizliğe teslim olsun."
